name: Denatured
description:
Ten years after an experiment, a group of clones return to the lab for their last moments, all believing they are the original, and the only one that will not die.

Denatured is a live-action roleplaying game by Rachel Rudy

Logistics:
  • Participants: Four to six people, with six being the ideal, one of whom facilitates.
  • Time: Roughly two hours plus additional time for an introduction and a debrief.
  • This game is for you if: You like science fiction, ethical conundrums, and hard choices.
  • Content warnings: Death, light touching (can be substituted for a quiet “you’re next” if players prefer).
What's Included?
  • 5 page rules PDF ( 7 page handouts PDF, free, also required)
